8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

gadget-mnemonic-setter

Generic function

Summary

Sets the mnemonic for the specified gadget.

Signature

gadget-mnemonic-setter mnemonic gadget => mnemonic

Arguments

mnemonic
An instance of type false-or(<character>).

gadget
An instance of type <gadget>.

Values

mnemonic
An instance of type false-or(<character>).

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

Sets the mnemonic for gadget to mnemonic. On Windows, the mnemonic is displayed as an underlined character in the label of the gadget, and pressing the key for that character activates the gadget or gives it the focus.

See also

gadget-accelerator-setter, page 553

gadget-mnemonic, page 572

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
